anyOf.description: DimName1-10 are often used for additional, customer-specific, coding dimensions. Specifies the dimension name.

externalCode.description: External identifier that is used as a key in API for the coding line.

anyOf.description: Text1-5 can be used for additional, customer-specific, text fields
Num1-5 can be used for additional, customer-specific, numeric fields.
Date1-5 can be used for additional, customer-specific, date fields
DimCode1-10 are often used for additional, customer-specific, coding dimensions. Specifies the dimension code.

splitPercent.description: Percentage of requisition lineâ€™s cost which this coding row covers (cost can be split between coding lines). Current always 100 (as long as there is one coding line per requisition line).

rowIndex.description: Purchase internal document coding line number.

Owner.description: Specifies owner for the order / requisition. Owner is by default same person as creator, unless manually changed.

externalCode.description: External identifier that is used as a key in API for the requisition.

companyName.description: P2P company name for buyer company.

exchangeRateOrg.description: Exchange rate between requisition currency (=purchaseCurrency) and group  currency.

organizationUnitName.description: P2P company name for buyer organisation unit.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the purchase order was last updated (from Basware P2P or from customer end).

groupCurrency.description:
Currency code of the group / organization in P2P for which the requisition is placed. 
The group is a parent-level entity to the company in P2P.

netSum.description: Net sum of requisition in requisition currency (purchaseCurrency).

companyCurrency.description: Currency code of the company in P2P for which the requisition is placed.

anyOf.description: Requisition number in external system (for imported requisitions).
URL link to view the requisition in Basware P2P.

netSumComp.description: Net sum of requisition in company currency.

companyCode.description: P2P company code name for buyer company.

taxSum.description: Tax sum of requisition in requisition currency (purchaseCurrency).

taxSumOrg.description: Tax sum of requisition in company currency.

anyOf.description: Requisition classification code (values specified by customer). Often used to group requisitions and assign different groups to be handled to different persons.

processingStatus.description: Processing status of exported purchase requisition in Basware API. WaitingForExport = New requisition data (not acknowledged), which is waiting to be fetched. Exported = This requisition has been acknowledged by customer system.

anyOf.description: HeaderDataNum1-5: Can be used for for customer-specific numeric fields.

grossSumOrg.description: Gross sum of requisition in company currency.

netSumOrg.description: Net sum of requisition in company currency.

anyOf.description: Reason why order is placed (text description).

requisitionCreationTime.description: Creation time of the requisition in P2P.

anyOf.description: HeaderDataText1-5: Can be used for for customer-specific text fields.

requisitionExportTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the requisition was exported from P2P to Basware API.

purchaseCurrency.description: Currency code for currency in which the requisition is placed.

anyOf.description: Specifies how the requisition lines will be grouped by P2P into orders (according to grouping criteria).
HeaderDataDate1-5: Can be used for for customer-specific date fields.

exchangeRateComp.description: Exchange rate between requisition currency (=purchaseCurrency) and company currency.

anyOf.description: Order number in external system (for imported orders).

taxSumComp.description: Tax sum of requisition in company currency.

grossSumComp.description: Gross sum of requisition in company currency.

organizationUnitCode.description: P2P company  code for buyer organisation unit.

documentSource.description: States whether the requisition was created in P2P or imported from external system.

requisitionStatus.description: Status of the requisition in Basware P2P.

grossSum.description: Gross sum of requisition in requisition currency (purchaseCurrency).

DeliveryAddress.description:
Specifies delivery address for the purchase requisition. If no address specified, uses the default delivery address of organization (configured in P2P).
Delivery address on header level applies to entire purchase reuisition. If addresses are also provided on requisition lines, these will apply only to the corresponding lines.

name.description: Specifies the addressâ€™ name for the goods delivery.

Creator.description: Specifies who has created the order / requisition.

hidePricesFromSupplier.description: Specifies, if all price information is hidden from the supplier in the outgoing purchase order.

externalCode.description: External identifier that is used as a key in API for the requisition line.

tax1SumOrg.description: Tax sum 1 in organization home currency.

anyOf.description: LineDataText1-5 can be used for customer-specific text fields. These fields are from 'Line data' -tab of the requisition line in P2P.

groupCurrency.description: Identifies the organization's home currency. All lines within a requisition have the same organization currency.

grossPriceComp.description: Gross unit price in company currency (with discount).

anyOf.description: Identifier for the agreed delivery term for the item. If empty, supplier's default delivery term is used.
Desired end date the goods are to be delivered.
Indicates if the goods can be automatically received by Basware P2P on behalf of the user.
Tax sum 1 in company home currency.

netSumOrg.description: Net sum of order in organization home currency.

anyOf.description: LinePricingDate1-5 can be used for customer-specific date fields. These fields are from 'Pricing' -tab of the requisition line in P2P.
Net unit price in purchasing currency (without discount).

Supplier code. The code must match a valid supplier for the organization, or it will be emptied during import. If the purchase order is a self-service order and the supplier is invalid, the import will fail.
Currency code for currency in which the requisition is placed.

grossPriceOrg.description: Gross unit price in organization currency (with discount).

anyOf.description: Specifies if order is attached as pdf file when order is sent to supplier through Basware network.

netPriceComp.description: Net unit price in company currency (with discount).

anyOf.description: Payment term code. Identifies terms of payment when supplier charges the customer.

sendingMethod.description: Determines how Basware P2P sends order to supplier when the order is placed.

anyOf.description: The requisition line number in the external system. The value must be unique for each line on the requisition.

priceType.description: Defines if the unit price stated is net or gross.

anyOf.description: Net unit price in organization currency (without discount).
Code for the item's purchasing category. The code must match a valid, active purchasing category for the organization. If invalid, the field will be emptied during import.

grossSumComp.description: Gross sum in company home currency.

netPriceOrg.description: Net unit price in organization currency (with discount).

anyOf.description:
The United Nations Standard Products and Services Code, a unique 8-digit number used to identify trade items, products, and services. 
The value can also be used to match order lines to invoice lines. If empty, resolved by Basware P2P using the item's categoryCode.
Desired date the goods are to be delivered.

taxTotalOrg.description: Total tax sum in organization home currency.

refundLine.description: Specifies whether the line is a refund line. True = refund line, false = not a refund line.

anyOf.description: Specifies the email address(es) where the order is sent to when sending order to supplier. Can contain multiple email addresses separated by semicolon. Used when orderRecipientType is set as 'Owner' or 'SupplierAndOwner'.
LineDataNum1-5 can be used for customer-specific numeric fields. These fields are from 'Line data' -tab of the requisition line in P2P.
Net unit price in company currency (without discount).
LineDataDate1-5 can be used for customer-specific date fields. These fields are from 'Line data' -tab of the requisition line in P2P.

taxTotal.description: Total tax sum in purchasing currency (=purchaseCurrency).

netPrice.description: Net unit price in purchasing currency (with discount).

grossPrice.description: Gross unit price in purchasing currency (with discount).

anyOf.description: Gross unit price in purchasing currency (without discount).
LinePricingNum1-5 can be used for customer-specific numeric fields. These fields are from 'Pricing' -tab of the requisition line in P2P.

companyCurrency.description: Identifies the company's home currency. All lines within a requisition have the same company home currency.

lineType.description: Specifies how the requisition line got created.

anyOf.description: Additional information. Contains data from custom fields in free-text ordering forms.
Gross unit price in company currency (without discount).

taxTotalComp.description: Total tax sum in company home currency.

anyOf.description: Coding line(s). Note: Each requisition line currently has one coding row.

netSumComp.description: Net sum in company home currency.

anyOf.description: Tax sum 2 in organization home currency.
Note sent to supplier concerning this order. Send to supplier when order is placed.

releaseOrdersRequired.description: Used only if the order type is blanket to specify, if the blanket purchase order requires release orders.

anyOf.description: Specifies the email address(es) where the order is sent to when sending order to owner. Can contain multiple email addresses separated by semicolon. Used when orderRecipientType is set as 'Owner' or 'SupplierAndOwner'.

isRejected.description: Specifies if the requisition line is rejected.

anyOf.description: Used only if the order type is blanket to specify the start date for blanket purchase order validity period (date format: yyyy-MM-dd).
Tax percent 2. Can be used for example for handling reverse charges on EU VAT.

grossSumOrg.description: Gross sum in organization home currency.

anyOf.description: LinePricingText1-5 can be used for customer-specific text fields. These fields are from 'Pricing' -tab of the requisition line in P2P.
Code for the item's purchasing category.

lineStatus.description: Status of the requisition line in Basware P2P.

anyOf.description: Lists person(s) who should receive the goods.

The email address(es) where the order is sent by P2P purchase. Can contain multiple email addresses separated by semicolon. The order is sent to these addresses when orderRecipientType is 'Owner' or 'Both'.

requisitionLineNumber.description: The requisition line number in Basware P2P.

anyOf.description: Gross unit price in organization currency (without discount).
Defines how many items a customer wants to purchase. The quantity must contain a positive value.
Tax sum 2 in company home currency.
Delivery location. Used to further specify the delivery term.
Used only if the order type is blanket to specify the end date for blanket purchase order validity period (date format: yyyy-MM-dd).
A code that identifies purchased items for internal reporting and communication.
Indicates if the partial delivery of goods is allowed.

Specifies the email address(es) where the order is sent to when sending order to supplier. Can contain multiple email addresses separated by semicolon. Used when orderRecipientType is set as 'Owner' or 'SupplierAndOwner'.

hidePricesFromSupplier.description: Specifies, if all price information is hidden from the supplier in the outgoing purchase order.

anyOf.description: Used only if the order type is blanket to specify the end date for blanket purchase order validity period (date format: yyyy-MM-dd).

releaseOrdersRequired.description: Used only if the order type is blanket to specify, if the blanket purchase order requires release orders.

anyOf.example: Check the packing so it will not break

anyOf.description: Contact email to which supplier can send questions about the order. Note: When order is sent to supplier, it is not sent to this email. Note: Fields visible on the order sent to supplier are configured in P2P Purchase.
Specifies the requisition lines which are on-course for being grouped to this order.

orderRecipientType.description:
Determines who order is sent to.
-Supplier(0) : Order is sent only to supplier.
-If orderingMethod is email, order is sent to the email indicated by 'supplierOrderingEmail'. -If orderingMethod is network, the order is sent through Basware network.
-Owner (1): Order is sent only to email address(es) indicated by field 'otherOrderingEmail'. Used for example when goods were picked up from a store and no order needs to be sent to supplier.
-SupplierAndOwner (2): Order is sent to both supplier and email addresses indicated by field 'otherOrderingEmail'. Order delivery method to supplier is determined by orderingMethod, same as above.

grossSum.description: Gross sum of the grouped order line(s).

netSum.description: Net sum of the grouped order line(s).

anyOf.description: List of people who should receive the order.
Specifies if order is attached as pdf file when order is sent to supplier through Basware network.

The email address(es) where the order is sent by P2P purchase. Can contain multiple email addresses separated by semicolon. The order is sent to these addresses when orderRecipientType is 'Owner' or 'Both'.
Used only if the order type is blanket to specify the start date for blanket purchase order validity period (date format: yyyy-MM-dd).

sendingMethod.description: Determines how Basware P2P will sends the order to supplier when the order is placed.
